title: New Hampshire
prompt: A weathered wooden sign reading a New Hampshire county name stands at a rural intersection, morning mist rising from forested hills in the background. The composition captures a narrow country road stretching into soft golden light, with a small brick building—perhaps a closed hospital or shuttered clinic—visible in the middle distance, its windows dark. Photograph in muted greens and grays with warm amber light breaking through clouds, shot at ground level to emphasize the texture of aging infrastructure and rural geography, evoking quiet determination and the weight of structural challenge amid natural resilience.
